title: Hives
description: Hives rashes usually settle down within a few minutes to a few days. You can often treat hives yourself.

header.value: Hives rashes usually settle down within a few minutes to a few days. You can often treat hives yourself.

value.caption: Hives can look like red, raised patches
value.alt: Hives on the side of a thigh

value.caption: The rash can also be red spots
value.alt: Red spots on the hand and leg
